attributes.action: Review student tuition fees and accommodation costs.
attributes.additional_details: The online lectures and seminars are having negative effects on students. We are being expected to pay full price for our accommodation when we are being told not to go back. It makes no sense and is extremely frustrating and confusing for students.
attributes.background: Tuition fees and accommodation costs should be reviewed because of the lockdown. Many of us are being told we are not allowed to go back to our accommodation unless we are on a specific course. Being expected to pay full tuition and accommodation costs is unfair when we aren’t allowed back.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
